about_the_game:
The protagonist, who has taken a job as a special cleaner, goes to his first cleaning site with his seniors.

Witnessing the scene of a gruesome death, he begins to feel something that he has never felt before.

He begins to feel the presence of something he has never felt before.

A collection of short stories in 3 parts

6 endings + several extra endings

Keyboard and mouse controls.

Operation Method

Movement

WASD

Search

Left click

TAB key

Menu screen

This game contains elements of a walking simulator in which you move around the map while checking items.

The game is a fictional story that has nothing to do with any actual incidents or accidents, although it does contain some cruel expressions.

You are welcome to distribute the game in real life.

No prior notification is required, but please include the URL of the store page in the summary section of the distribution page.

name: CrimeSceneCleaners｜特殊清掃

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 Radeon HD 5770
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
